itemDescription: Church of England clergyman and religious controversialist

wikipedia_page.main: Edward Pearson (1756–1811) was an English academic and theologian, Master of Sidney Sussex College, Cambridge from 1808.

response: *Edward Pearson (1756–1811), academic and theologian, Master of Sidney Sussex College, Cambridge and Vice chancellor of the University of Cambridge.
